data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Jehanabad, Bihar, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jehanabad, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,125,300 citizens of the the county of Jehanabad.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Jehanabad, Bihar, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Jehanabad, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kharwar people.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Jehanabad, Bihar, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Jehanabad to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Jehanabad, Bihar, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Jehanabad
location.people_groups_list: Nagarchi (Muslim traditions), Chero, Rautia, Beldar Laria (Hindu traditions), Chik (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nagarchi (Muslim traditions) (200), Chero (158,000), Rautia (115,000), Beldar Laria (Hindu traditions) (52,000), Chik (Hindu traditions) (103,000)
